53.movie_plot: On a faraway planet where blue giants rule, oppressed humanoids rebel against their machine-like leaders.

29.movie_name: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home (1986)

5.movie_plot: A remake of the 1951 classic science fiction film about an alien visitor and his giant robot counterpart who visit Earth.

27.movie_plot: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.
